missions.name: One Hell of a Treasure Hunt
missions.description: Retrieve the skull of the Alpha X-Triceratops from its Volcanic stomping ground. Don't panic, there's just fire and lava everywhere.

missions.description: It's blue vs. red! The team with the highest score when the timer runs out wins.

missions.name: Dodoball Shot Clock
missions.description: Shooting hoops, just like on the playground...only there's a dodo instead of a ball. Ignore the dodo's complaints and score 10 points before the timer runs out. Hey, if the dodo doesn't like it, it should have learned to fly.
